attributes.action: make the use of TFL buses free for ALL students, and give them more discounts for tube travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Secondary school students and college students get the best discounts on oyster cards. it seems like university students are disadvantaged. they need free bus travel too and they need a better discount than only 30%. Students work hard and are the future of this great nation especially the university ones. The government should provide them with more advantages with regards to public transport!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
